sentences.en: ...fishing boats which normally catch a mix of cod, haddock, and whiting.
sentences.cn: …一般混合捕捞鳕鱼、黑线鳕和牙鳕的渔船。

sentences.en: Fish such as cod, flounder, and haddock are caught in this way.
sentences.cn: 鳕 、 比目鱼 、 黑线鳕等都是用这种方法捕捞的.

sentences.en: Tonight the haddock were shoaling massively in three hundred fathoms.
sentences.cn: 今晚鳕鱼将要大量群集在距岸三百浔的地方.

sentences.en: Use Scottish smoked haddock if you can.
sentences.cn: 如果可以的话就用苏格兰熏黑线鳕。

trans.tran_cn: 小口鳕，黑线鳕（产于北大西洋的食用鱼）
trans.tran_en: a common fish that lives in northern seas and is often used as food
